amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $6 million from the Office of the Secretary of Transportation to the Coast Guard operations expenses account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of July 21, as amendment No. 24, that increases funding for the Coast Guard operating expenses account by $6 million; and reduces funding by $6 million for salaries and expenses of the Office of the Secretary of DOT.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaTourette amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 234 (Roll no. 558).
